workshoptitle: Monitor public transportation using GoldenGate Stream Analytics

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup Compute Instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create artifacts for the Stream Analytics pipeline
tutorials.description: How to create Artifacts for a Stream Analytics pipeline to monitor public transport in a specifed region,

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Build the Stream Analytics pipeline
tutorials.description: How to build a Stream Analytics pipeline to monitor public transport in a specifed region,

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Add business rules to the Stream Analytics pipeline
tutorials.description: How to Add Business Rules to a Stream Analytics Pipeline, to monitor public transport in a specifed region,

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Add a Database Reference to the Stream Analytics pipeline
tutorials.description: How to Add a Database Reference to a Stream Analytics pipeline,

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Configure graphical views in the Stream Analytics pipeline
tutorials.description: How to configure Graphical Views in the Stream Analytics pipeline,

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Define a Target in the Stream Analytics pipeline
tutorials.description: How to define a Target in the Stream Analytics pipeline,

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Publish the Stream Analytics pipeline
tutorials.description: How to publish the Stream Analytics pipeline,

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
